page.title: 12LIFE STYLES contd.
page.content: People come from all over the world and stay at the castle. For entertainment Mr. Frehling can seat 150 in the ballroom and in his restaurant he can seat 85. The Kings Room will take 30. On a busy Saturday the hotel will cook up to 300 meals. Mr Frehling works a 12 to 18 hour day, he has a night porter to help. The Castle and grounds cover 15 acres, the main uses are for wedding reception and the hotel. Guests can fish in the lake and ride the horses. During the second world war the hotel was used as an officers' mess. In 1970 it was changed into an hotel.
